actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Telecommunications, Consumer Protection and Finance.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Telecommunications, Consumer Protection and Finance

official_title: A bill to amend the Motor Vehicle Information and Cost Savings Act to require that the impact test velocity in the motor vehicle bumper standard established by the Secretary of Transportation shall be five miles per hour.

summary.text: Amends the Motor Vehicle Information and Cost Savings Act to require that the impact test velocity in the Federal motor vehicle bumper standard shall be five miles per hour.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Motor Vehicle Information and Cost Savings Act to require that the impact test velocity in the motor vehicle bumper standard established by the Secretary of Transportation shall be five miles per hour.
